scripts.start:dev:linux: concurrently "cd backend && npm run start:dev" "cd frontend && sleep 1 && npm run start:linux:darwin"
scripts.start:prod:linux: concurrently "cd backend && npm run start:prod" "cd frontend && sleep 1 && npm run start:linux:darwin"
scripts.start:dev:win: concurrently "cd backend && npm run start:dev" "cd frontend && sleep 1 && npm run start:win32"
scripts.start:prod:win: concurrently "cd backend && npm run start:prod" "cd frontend && sleep 1 && npm run start:win32"
scripts.install:all: concurrenttly "cd frontend && npm install" "cd backend && npm install"
